mapper.sql: hfsid, entId, erpCode, shopId, shopCode, status, lang, creator, createDate, modifier, updateDate
mapper.update:
update hwg_fulfillmentshop
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (shopCode,shopId) in ${params}

update hwg_fulfillmentshop
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (shopCode,shopId) not in ${params}
mapper.select: select * from hwg_fulfillmentshop where status = 1 and erpCode= #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: insert into hwg_fulfillmentshop (hfsid, entId, erpCode, shopId, shopCode, status, lang, creator, createDate, modifier, updateDate) values (#{hfsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
